trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The battle-ready Mord's prey has led him to Ladle.
TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDWARRIOR03532_000_000<tab>They will not escape me this time, oh no. Who? Criminals! They ignore Mord law and shame us all!
TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDWARRIOR03532_000_001<tab>We must never take crystals from the Wall, for we believe that they can turn people into sin eaters. Even pieces that fall off are forbidden!
TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDWARRIOR03532_000_002<tab>But those swindlers collect them, sell them! Of course, they do not tell their customers where the crystals come from, but I know their secret.
TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDWARRIOR03532_000_003<tab>That is why I am here, to bring them to justice. Breaking our code, selling under false pretenses. Very serious crimes!

TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDWARRIOR03532_000_004<tab>I have tracked them this far and they will soon be mine! But there are too many to catch by myself and I dare not risk failure. Stranger, will you lend me your aid?

TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDWARRIOR03532_000_005<tab>I will circle around from the west of the palace while you approach from the east. Like the jaws of a zonure snapping shut! Take them alive if possible, but if they resist, show no mercy, for you will get none from them. When it's over, meet me back here.
TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDCRIMINALA03532_000_010<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s seen too much! Kill <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!

TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDWARRIOR03532_000_020<tab>Heh. I take it that's not your blood? The ones I caught also refused to come quietly. Well, what is done is done. They got what they deserved for spitting on our code!

TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDWARRIOR03532_000_021<tab>Whether the Wall's crystals have anything to do with sin eaters is not for me to say. What I do know is that without rules, without law, we are no better than beasts. Beasts, I tell you!
TEXT_LUCKZH204_03532_MOLDWARRIOR03532_000_022<tab>Ahem! Excuse me. Before we part ways, here is your reward for punishing the wicked.
